question: Which pair of items will repel each other?
candidate_answers: (A) a positively-charged wool sock and a neutral plastic bag (B) a neutral cotton sweater and a negatively-charged plastic pellet (C) a negatively-charged balloon and a positively-charged piece of paper (D) a negatively-charged plastic strip and a negatively-charged piece of cloth
answer: a negatively-charged balloon and a positively-charged piece of paper
label: C
